title: Professional DSLR Camera
description: Latest model DSLR with 24.2MP sensor, 4K video recording, and dual pixel autofocus. Includes kit lens, battery, charger, and 32GB memory card. Perfect for photography enthusiasts and content creators.

title: Electric Guitar Package
description: Professional electric guitar with maple neck, rosewood fingerboard, and dual humbucker pickups. Comes with amplifier, cable, picks, and gig bag. Great for rock, blues, and jazz musicians.

title: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced smartwatch with heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking, sleep analysis, and 7-day battery life. Water resistant to 50 meters, includes multiple sport modes and smartphone notifications.

title: Running Shoes
description: Premium running shoes with responsive cushioning, breathable mesh upper, and durable rubber outsole. Perfect for road running, gym workouts, and everyday comfort. Men's size 10.

title: Modern Abstract Painting
description: Vibrant abstract acrylic painting on canvas, measuring 36x48 inches. Features bold colors and dynamic brushstrokes that create energy and movement. Signed by contemporary artist.

title: Wireless Earbuds Pro
description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, transparency mode, and spatial audio. Features 8-hour battery life with charging case, sweat resistance, and touch controls.

title: Smart Speaker
description: Voice-controlled smart speaker with premium sound quality, built-in assistant, and smart home compatibility. Connects to Wi-Fi and supports multi-room audio setup.

title: Smartphone Latest Model
description: Flagship smartphone with triple camera system, 5G connectivity, 128GB storage, and all-day battery life. Includes fast charger, protective case, and screen protector.

title: Gaming Laptop
description: High-performance gaming laptop with RTX graphics, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and 144Hz display. Perfect for gaming, streaming, and content creation. Includes gaming mouse and backpack.

title: Coffee Maker Machine
description: Programmable coffee maker with built-in grinder, thermal carafe, and multiple brew strength options. Makes up to 12 cups and includes permanent filter and cleaning supplies.

title: Cookbook Collection
description: Set of 8 professional cookbooks covering international cuisines, baking, grilling, and healthy eating. Includes recipes from award-winning chefs with beautiful photography.

title: Designer Handbag
description: Luxury leather handbag with multiple compartments, gold-tone hardware, and adjustable shoulder strap. Includes authenticity card, dust bag, and original packaging.

title: Camping Tent 4-Person
description: Weather-resistant camping tent with waterproof rainfly, ventilation windows, and easy setup design. Includes carrying bag, stakes, and repair kit. Perfect for family camping trips.

title: Standing Desk
description: Electric height-adjustable standing desk with memory presets, LED display, and spacious work surface. Made from sustainable materials with cable management system.

title: Drone with Camera
description: 4K camera drone with GPS, obstacle avoidance, and 30-minute flight time. Features follow-me mode, return to home function, and includes extra batteries and carrying case.
